content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Insufficient items in inventory
-  Ensure you have enough items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.
### Harvesting resources out of reach
- Ensure you are close enough to the resource you are trying to harvest. Move closer to the resource before attempting to harvest it.

NAMESPACE
```
